subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade stole Jason Kidd's inbounds pass with 1.4 seconds left, depriving the Nets of one last shot to extend their season, and sealing the Heat's victory to win the series 4-1.
snippet: Dwyane Wade stole Jason Kidd's inbounds pass with 1.4 seconds left, depriving the Nets of one last shot to extend their season, and sealing the Heat's victory to win the series 4-1.
